department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: dress made of light brown paper with some scattered text and covered with a glue or hardening compound; there are some spots of red pigment scattered on dress; band at waist is reddish in color and ties in bow on back; black cut-out of bird with outstretched wings on chest; lighter brown attached collar and trim at bottom of sleeves and at one pocket off-set on front; electrical fitting for light bulb inside with attached cord; hangs on red wire hanger; artist sent two light blubs GE nightlight 7.5 watts
medium: Paper, pigment, wood, electrical components, light bulb
title: Childhood
